Log in
October 2024 Edition
Zapier's latest
Explore the latest product updates and app news, so you can automate even faster.
What's new
Happy Zapping: Little updates that make work flow better
We just shipped tons of enhancements for smoother workflows and increased efficiency-all inspired by your feedback.
Here are our absolute favorites
Link related data in Zapier Tables
Eliminate manual updates with the power of a relational database, now in Tables. Connect data, sync changes, and find related records.
Learn how linked records work
New and improved Code by Zapier
Code steps are easier than ever, with more accurate line numbers, advanced code editor features, and more.
Explore all the updates
Spotlight
Updated course: Automate your work
This course on Learn now includes an empowering chatbot that can answer all of your Zapier questions.
Take the course →
Product update: o1 models available for ChatGPT
OpenAI's o1-preview and o1-mini models are now available for use with Zapier's ChatGPT integration to further automate your workflows.
Try it in your Zaps →
Automate workflows with Google Ads
We're giving your ads a boost: Get 2k free tasks per month for six months when you use eligible Google Ads actions in your Zaps.
Automate Google Ads →
Embed Stripe in your interfaces
Collect payments for one-time transactions or recurring subscriptions within any of your custom interfaces.
Learn how to set it up →
App showcase
Azure OpenAI
Built an AI app with Azure OpenAI Service Studio? Now you can use your custom copilots in your Zaps! Unlock AI automation for your entire team-with the security of Azure.
Explore Azure OpenAI integrations →
New and noteworthy apps
Highlighting 14 new integrations and 17 updates, including…
Zoom Team Chat
Automation has entered the (Zoom) team chat. Send messages, set your presence status, and more.
Explore Zoom Team Chat integrations →
Looker
Manage user access, run Looks and SQL queries, and share data insights faster.
Explore Looker integrations →
Krisp
Share action items, meeting summaries, and call transcripts. (No more lawnmower noise in the background.)
Explore Krisp integrations →
ClickFunnels
Organize contacts, track new payments, and manage your online courses from signup to completion.
Explore ClickFunnels integrations →
Nextdoor
Get more ROI from your Nextdoor ads. Route new leads to your sales pipeline, track conversions, and more.
Explore Nextdoor integrations →
Discover the latest
So many updates, so little space: Join the Zapier Community or visit our Help Center for even more product updates.
Got a question? Send us a message
